title: Request Quote
billingAddressMissing: No billing address was found for your user. Please contact the Pfeiffer Vacuum Service.
deliveryAddressMissing: No delivery address found. Please create one first and come back to checkout.
checkDetails: Please check all details of your request once again before you send it.
orderNotSuccessful: Unfortunately we could not process your request at this time. Please check your internet connection and try again later. If the problem persists please contact us.
requestDescription: Thank you very much for your request to Pfeiffer Vacuum. We have sent a copy of your request to your email address. We will contact you as soon as possible.
requestSupport: Please include this number with all support requests.
deliveryDetails: Please send us your inquiry, so that we can inform you about an exact delivery time.
privacyPolicyLink: Here you can find the privacy policy.
priceInformation1: The here shown Online Price is a reference price that does not include freight, customs and taxes and is not maintained in all global currencies.
priceInformation2: To get your individual offer (in your local currency), please send us your request, so that your local Pfeiffer Vacuum Company / Partner Company will then provide you with your individual offer and pricing.
